text: nise shinja o mo shitte ora reru tamedeatta. `Arrā no michi no tame ni shussei shi nasai. Soretomo (jibun no machi o) shubi shi nasai.' To iwa reru to,`kare-ra wa watashi-tachi ni tatakau koto (no kachi) ga wakareba, anata gata ni shitagaou' to itta. Sonohi kare-ra wa, shinkō yori mo haishin ni chikakatta. Kare-ra no Ro wa kokoro ni mo nai koto o iu. Daga arrā wa, kare-ra no kakusu koto o subete shitte ora reru
